REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit Dim oDialogPrint AS Object, oDialogPrintModel as Object
Sub DruckSchreibschutz() Dim oOption_Print as Object,oOption_Fax as Object,oOption_Mail as Object,oBox_LogoDrucken as Object Dim sSQL2 as String,oRecord2 as Object
oOption_Print = oDialogPrintModel.getByName("Button_Druck") oOption_Fax = oDialogPrintModel.getByName("Button_Fax") oOption_Mail = oDialogPrintModel.getByName("Button_Mail") oBox_LogoDrucken = oDialogPrintModel.getByName("CheckBox_Logo_drucken")
if oOption_Fax.State=1 or oOption_Mail.State=1 then oBox_LogoDrucken.Enabled=0 elseif oOption_Print.State=1 then oBox_LogoDrucken.Enabled=1 if ifPrintLogoDefault(iUserID_lokal) = 0 then oBox_LogoDrucken.State = 0 elseif ifPrintLogoDefault(iUserID_lokal) = 1 then oBox_LogoDrucken.State = 1 End if End If End Sub
Sub Druck_vorbereiten() Dim vStatus as Variant Dim sSQL1 as String,sSQL2 as String,sSQL3 as String,sSQL4 as String Dim oRecord1 as Object,oRecord2 as Object Dim oOption_Print as Object,oOption_Fax as Object,oOption_Mail as Object,oBox_LogoDrucken as Object Dim ifFax as integer,ifPrint as integer,ifMail as integer Dim ifLogoDrucken as Integer,iDocument_TypID as Integer,lProjektID as Long
Dim iPrint_Typ as Integer,sAnschrift as String Dim sAnrede_Kontakt as String,sTitel as String,sVorname as String,sName1 as String Dim sName2 as String,sName3 as String,sName4 as String Dim sLand as String,sLand_Eigen as String,sPLZ as String,sOrt as String Dim sStrasse as String,sHausnummer as String,sTelefon as String Dim sFunktelefon as String,sFax as String,sEMail as String,sUrl as String Dim sReferenzID as String,sOrdner as String Dim sAnrede_Ansprechpartner as String,sTitel_Ansprechpartner as String Dim sVorname_Ansprechpartner as String,sName_Ansprechpartner as String Dim sFunktelefon_Ansprechpartner as String,sFax_Ansprechpartner as String Dim sEMail_Ansprechpartner as String,sTelefon_Ansprechpartner as String Dim sAbteilung_Ansprechpartner as String,sProjektName as String,sDocumentName as String
Dim sReferenz as String,sDocument_Name as String,sBody as String Dim sAnrede as String Dim iOptionSerienbrief as Integer,iOptionSignum as Integer Dim sSignumURL as String,sGruszformel as String,sAbsender as String Dim sLeerzeilen as String Dim sIfKontaktID as String,sIfReferenzID as String
Dim sNummern as String Dim sErstellungsdatum as String
if lDocumentID > 0 then Drucktabelle_leeren(iUserID_lokal) sSQL1="select Option_Serienbrief from "& sKorrespondenz &" where DocumentID="& lDocumentID oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() iOptionSerienbrief=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend if iOptionSerienbrief=1 then Serienbriefe_drucken() else if lKontaktID > 0 then
GlobalScope.BasicLibraries.LoadLibrary("Tools") oDialogPrint = LoadDialog_Korrespondenz("Standard", "Drucken") oDialogPrintModel = oDialogPrint.Model oOption_Print = oDialogPrintModel.getByName("Button_Druck") oOption_Fax = oDialogPrintModel.getByName("Button_Fax") oOption_Mail = oDialogPrintModel.getByName("Button_Mail") oBox_LogoDrucken = oDialogPrintModel.getByName("CheckBox_Logo_drucken")
oDialogPrint.Title=sTitle_lokal & " - Dokument drucken"
sSQL2="select t1.Anrede,t1.Name1,t1.Titel,t1.Vorname,t1.Name2,t1.Name3,t1.Name4,t1.Land,"&_ "t1.PLZ,t1.Ort,t1.Strasse,t1.Hausnummer,t1.Fax,t1.EMail,"&_ "t2.Abteilung,t2.Anrede,t2.Titel,t2.Vorname,t2.Name,t2.Fax,t2.EMail,"&_ "t3.Document_TypID,t3.Referenz,t3.Erstellungsdatum,t3.Document_Name,t3.KontaktID,"&_ "t3.Body,t3.Anrede,t3.Option_Serienbrief,t3.Option_Signum,"&_ "t3.Signum_URL,t3.Gruszformel,t3.Absender,t3.Leerzeilen,t1.KontaktID,t1.ReferenzID,t4.Land,"&_ "t3.ProjektID,t5.Projekt_Name,t3.Document_Name "&_ " from "& sKorrespondenz &" as t3 "&_ " LEFT JOIN "& sAnsprechpartner &" as t2 "&_ " ON t2.AnsprechpartnerID=t3.AnsprechpartnerID"&_ " LEFT JOIN "& sProjekte &" as t5"&_ " ON t5.ProjektID=t3.ProjektID,"& sKontakte &" as t1,"&_ " Einstellungen as t4"&_ " where t3.DocumentID="& lDocumentID &_ " and t1.KontaktID=t3.KontaktID"&_ " and t4.EinstellungsID="& iEinstellungsID_lokal
oRecord1=oResult(sSQL2) While oRecord1.next() sAnrede_Kontakt=oRecord1.getString(1) sName1=oRecord1.getString(2) sTitel=oRecord1.getString(3) sVorname=oRecord1.getString(4) sName2=oRecord1.getString(5) sName3=oRecord1.getString(6) sName4=oRecord1.getString(7) sLand=oRecord1.getString(8) sPLZ=oRecord1.getString(9) sOrt=oRecord1.getString(10) sStrasse=oRecord1.getString(11) sHausnummer=oRecord1.getString(12) sFax=oRecord1.getString(13) sEMail=oRecord1.getString(14) sAbteilung_Ansprechpartner=oRecord1.getString(15) sAnrede_Ansprechpartner=oRecord1.getString(16) sTitel_Ansprechpartner=oRecord1.getString(17) sVorname_Ansprechpartner=oRecord1.getString(18) sName_Ansprechpartner=oRecord1.getString(19) sFax_Ansprechpartner=oRecord1.getString(20) sEMail_Ansprechpartner=oRecord1.getString(21) iDocument_TypID=oRecord1.getInt(22) sReferenz=oRecord1.getString(23) sErstellungsdatum=oRecord1.getString(24) sDocument_Name=oRecord1.getString(25) sKontaktID=oRecord1.getString(26) sAnsprechpartnerID=oRecord1.getString(27) sBody=oRecord1.getString(28) sAnrede=oRecord1.getString(29) iOptionSignum=oRecord1.getInt(30) sSignumURL=oRecord1.getString(31) sGruszformel=oRecord1.getString(32) sAbsender=oRecord1.getString(33) sLeerzeilen=oRecord1.getString(34) sIfKontaktID=oRecord1.getString(35) sIfReferenzID=oRecord1.getString(36) sLand_Eigen=oRecord1.getString(37) lProjektID=oRecord1.getLong(38) sProjektName=oRecord1.getString(39) sDocumentName=oRecord1.getString(40) Wend
if ifPrintLogoDefault(iUserID_lokal) = 0 then oBox_LogoDrucken.State=0 elseif ifPrintLogoDefault(iUserID_lokal) = 1 then oBox_LogoDrucken.State=1 End if
vStatus = oDialogPrint.Execute() if vStatus = 0 then exit sub end if ifPrint = oOption_Print.State ifFax = oOption_Fax.State ifMail = oOption_Mail.State
if ifPrint = 1 then iPrint_Typ=0 ifLogoDrucken=oBox_LogoDrucken.State elseif ifFax = 1 then iPrint_Typ=1 ifLogoDrucken=0 elseif ifMail = 1 then iPrint_Typ=2 ifLogoDrucken=0 end if
if sFax_Ansprechpartner <> "" then sFax = sFax_Ansprechpartner End if if sEMail_Ansprechpartner <> "" then sEMail = sEMail_Ansprechpartner End if
' if sName2 = "" and sName3 = "" and sName4 = "" then ' sAnschrift = "\n" ' End if ' if sAnrede_Kontakt <> "" then ' sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sAnrede_Kontakt + "\n" ' End if if sTitel <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sTitel + " " End if if sVorname <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + fsConvertString(sVorname) + " " End if if sName1 <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + fsConvertString(sName1) + "\n" End if if sName2 <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + fsConvertString(sName2) + "\n" End if if sName3 <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + fsConvertString(sName3) + "\n" End if if sName4 <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + fsConvertString(sName4) + "\n" End if if sAbteilung_Ansprechpartner <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sAbteilung_Ansprechpartner + "\n" End if if sAnrede_Ansprechpartner <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sAnrede_Ansprechpartner + " " End if if sTitel_Ansprechpartner <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sTitel_Ansprechpartner + " " End if if sVorname_Ansprechpartner <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sVorname_Ansprechpartner + " " End if if sName_Ansprechpartner <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sName_Ansprechpartner + "\n" End if if TRIM(sStrasse) <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sStrasse + " " End if if TRIM(sHausnummer) <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sHausnummer + "\n" else sAnschrift = sAnschrift + "\n" End if if sPLZ <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sPLZ + " " End if if sOrt <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sOrt End if if sLand <> "" and UCASE(sLand) <> UCASE(sLand_Eigen) then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + "\n" + UCASE(sLand) End if if iPrint_Typ = 0 then 'drucken sAnschrift = sAnschrift elseif iPrint_Typ = 1 then 'faxen if sFax = "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift else sAnschrift = sAnschrift & "\n\nan Fax: " & sFax End if elseif iPrint_Typ = 2 then 'mailen if sEMail = "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift else sAnschrift = sAnschrift & "\n\nan E-Mail: " & sEMail End if End if
' sNummern = "'\n'" ' sNummern = "'\n,'" sNummern = sNummern + "'\tDatum:\t"& fConvDatum(sErstellungsdatum) &"\n\t',"&_ "t2.DocumentID,'\t','S"& UCase(Left(sKontakte,2)) &" ',t1.DocumentID"
if InStr(sKontakte,"Kunden") > 0 or InStr(sKontakte,"Kontakte") > 0 then if sIfKontaktID = "" then sNummern = sNummern else sNummern = sNummern + ",'\n\t',t2.KontaktID,'\t',t3.KontaktID" End if if sIfReferenzID = "" then sNummern = sNummern else sNummern = sNummern + ",'\n\t',t2.ReferenzID,'\t',t3.ReferenzID" End if elseif InStr(sKontakte,"Lieferanten") > 0 then if sIfReferenzID = "" then sNummern = sNummern else sNummern = sNummern + ",'\n\t',t2.KontaktID,'\t',t3.ReferenzID" End if End if
if sReferenz <> "" then sNummern = sNummern + ",'\n\tIhr Zeichen:\t"& sReferenz &"'" End if
if lProjektID > 0 and fsConvertString(sDocumentName) <> fsConvertString(sProjektName) then sDocumentName="concat('"& sProjektName &"',' \n',t1.Document_Name)" else sDocumentName="t1.Document_Name" end if
sSQL3="insert into "& sDrucker_TEMP(iUserID_lokal) &_ "(DocumentID,KontaktID,KontaktTyp,KorrespondenzTyp,EinstellungsID,UserID,Print_Typ,Document_Name,Betreff,Nummern,EMail,Fax,"&_ "Anrede,Body,Anschrift,Gruszformel,Absender,Option_Signum,Signum_URL,SignumHeight,SignumWidth,Leerzeilen,Print_Logo,Serienbrief)"&_ "select distinct "&_ "t1.DocumentID,t3.KontaktID,'"& sKontakte &"','"& sKorrespondenz &"','"& iEinstellungsID_lokal &"','"& iUserID_lokal &"',concat("& iPrint_Typ &"),"&_ sDocumentName &",t1.Document_Name,concat("& sNummern &"),'"& sEMail &"','"& sFax &"',"&_ "t1.Anrede,t1.Body,concat('"& sAnschrift &"'),t1.Gruszformel,t1.Absender,t1.Option_Signum,"&_ "t1.Signum_URL,t1.SignumHeight,t1.SignumWidth,t1.Leerzeilen,concat('"& ifLogoDrucken &"'),0 "&_ "from "& sKorrespondenz &" as t1,Document_Typ as t2,"& sKontakte &" as t3 "&_ "where t1.DocumentID="& lDocumentID &" "&_ "and t2.Document_TypID=t1.Document_TypID "&_ "and t3.KontaktID=t1.KontaktID" SQL_execute(sSQL3)
SetUserID(iUserID_lokal) KorrespondenzPrint() else MsgBox("Sie haben noch keinen "& sKontakte &" ausgew√§hlt!",48,sTitle_lokal) End if End if else MsgBox("Sie haben noch kein Dokument ausgew√§hlt und geladen!",16,sTitle_lokal) End if End sub
